message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value that represents the increase in the amounts of tax accrued but not yet paid.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I need to find the line item related to tax accrual. In the Operating Activities section, I can see the line "Increase (Decrease) in Tax Payable" with a value of 42584.04.

This line item represents the increase in the amounts of tax that have been accrued but not yet paid, as tax payable represents taxes that have been recognized in the accounting records but have not yet been paid to the tax authorities.

Since the value is positive (42584.04), it indicates an increase in tax payable, which means more tax was accrued than was paid during this period.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '42584.04'}}
```
